languageKey.label: Questionaire answers.
This is the table containing all answer records. Each answer has its own record and has a relation to a result record.
Use this to temporarily exclude this answer from display and export to csv file with the module Web > Questionaire.
Setting this option is practical when exporting the results to a csv file. You can, for instance, exclude this answer that was meant for testing purposes only.
The parent result record this answer belongs to.

Do not change this field if you want reliable results from the questionaire. Changing this field will exclude the answer from being exported to a csv file if the results do not match the ones of the questionaire that generated this answer.
tx_pbsurvey_results
The question this answer belongs to.
Each answer belongs to a question. Multiple answers can be given to one question, which is subject to the type of question. The value in this field is the question where this answer belongs to.
tx_pbsurvey_item, fe_users
Row identifier.
This identifier is used by the Web > Questionaire module to calculate statistics and proper export results.
Column identifier.
This identifier is used by the Web > Questionaire module to calculate statistics and proper export results.
A single answer to a question.
This field represents a single answer given by the user to a question. It is however possible this field is empty. In that case the answer will be calculated by the fields 'Row' and 'Column'.
